app_descript:
App Name: Trip.com
Package Name: ctrip.english

Brief: Embark on a journey of convenience with Trip.com, your comprehensive travel companion. This powerful app streamlines the booking process for flights, trains, car rentals, tours, and tickets, enhancing your travel experience by keeping it hassle-free from start to finish. With essential COVID-19 travel updates at your fingertips, Trip.com stands out as not only a booking platform but a vibrant travel community and a dependable advisor for adventurers around the globe.
